org.obrel.core

Class RelationEvent<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.esoco.lib.event.GenericEvent<S>
      • de.esoco.lib.event.ElementEvent<Relatable,Relation<T>,T>
        • org.obrel.core.RelationEvent<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Event<Relatable>

    public class RelationEvent<T>
extends ElementEvent<Relatable,Relation<T>,T>
    An element event subclass that contains information related to relation modifications. The invocation of listeners for such events will occur just before an operation is actually performed on the affected relation. If an implementation needs to prevent the change to the relation it may throw a runtime exception but it is recommended that such listeners are only used in special cases which should be well documented.

    To register a relation event listener for events it must be added as a relation with the relation type ListenerTypes.RELATION_LISTENERS to an arbitrary related object or a relation type. It may also be registered on a relation with ListenerTypes.RELATION_UPDATE_LISTENERS or a relation type with ListenerTypes.RELATION_TYPE_LISTENERS in which cases the listener will be informed of changes to the particular relation or relation type.

    The event handler may be an arbitrary implementation of the EventHandler interface for relation events or a super-type of RelationEvent. All registered listeners will either be notified of relation modifications in the particular object or (if registered on a relation type) of all changes to relations of that type in any object.

    A listener's handleEvent() method will be invoked if a relation event occurs. The RelationEvent parameter contains the informations that are relevant for the particular event and can be queried with the respective methods of the event class.

    • Constructor Detail

      • RelationEvent

        public RelationEvent(ElementEvent.EventType rType,
                     Relatable rSource,
                     Relation<T> rRelation,
                     T rUpdateValue,
                     Relatable rEventScope)
        Creates a new instance.
        Parameters:
        rType - The event type
        rSource - The relatable event source on which the relation has been modified
        rRelation - The relation that is affected by this event
        rUpdateValue - The update value in the case of update events
        rEventScope - The relatable object that defines the event scope

    • Method Detail

      • getEventScope

        public final Relatable getEventScope()
        Returns the relatable that defines the event scope. Depending on the affected event listener this is either the same as the source or in the case of ListenerTypes.RELATION_UPDATE_LISTENERS the corresponding relation or for ListenerTypes.RELATION_TYPE_LISTENERS the relation type.
        Returns:
        The eventScope value
